texts.biography: Deemer nearly had to be killed as a young adult, as his magical abilities were so out of control that he was a threat to himself and those around him.  He has since learned to control his powers, and is more than a formidable foe in combat.
texts.name: Deemer

specialty.description: Casts Meteor Shower with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units).
specialty.name: Meteor Shower
